title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s Dismissal of China Military Threat ‘Dangerously Naive’: Retired Colonel
description: Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. visits "The Faulkner Focus" at Fox News Channel Studios in New York City on June 2, 2023. (Jamie McCarthy/Getty Images)

title: ‘The Battle Isn’t Won’: Next 48 Hours Crucial in Quebec Wildfire Fight: Bonnardel

title: Liberal Government Leaves Door Open for Public Inquiry on Foreign Interference
description: Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs, Infrastructure, and Communities Dominic LeBlanc speaks during a news conference following the resignation of David Johnston in the foyer of the House of Commons on Parliament Hill in Ottawa, on June 10, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Justin Tang)

title: Canada to Send More Weapons to Ukraine, Trudeau Says on Trip to Kyiv
description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, right, holds a Ukrainian flag as a veteran writes a note during a tour of a military hospital in Kyiv, Ukraine on June 10, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Frank Gunn)

title: Iga Swiatek Beats Karolina Muchova in the French Open Final for Her 3rd Trophy in Paris, 4th Slam
description: Poland's Iga Swiatek holds the trophy as she celebrates winning the women's final match of the French Open tennis tournament against Karolina Muchova of the Czech Republic at the Roland Garros stadium in Paris on June 10, 2023. (Aurelien Morissard/AP Photo)

title: IN-DEPTH: Wildfires Exacerbated by Poor Forest Management, Professors Say
description: Smoke from wildfires burning across Ontario and Quebec blanket the skyline in Kingston, Ont., on June 6, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Lars Hagberg)

title: No Injuries After Planes Collide on Ground at Tokyo’s Haneda Airport: NHK
description: An aerial view shows Thai Airways and Eva Air aeroplanes on a taxiway after making contact at Haneda Airport, in Tokyo, Japan, on June 10, 2023. (Kyodo via Reuters)

title: South Korea Summons China Envoy Over ‘Provocative’ Remarks About US Ties

title: Japan to Allow More Skilled Foreign Workers to Reside Amid Labor Shortage

title: 12,000-Year-Old Tiny Bone Flutes Found in Israel That Imitate Predatory Birds
description: One of the seven miniature bone flutes found in Hula Valley, in Northern Israel. (Yoli Schwartz, Israel Antiquities Authority)

title: Former UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson Quits as MP Ahead of Verdict on Partygate Scandal

title: To Deliver on Her Campaign Promise on Health Care, Smith Needs Innovative Solutions: Analysts

title: Trudeau Makes Surprise Visit to Ukraine
description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, accompanied by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, meets with soldiers in Kyiv, Ukraine, on June 10, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Frank Gunn)

title: Child Plane Crash Survivors Get Medical Care in Bogota After Weeks in Jungle
description: A view of ambulances at the CATAM military airbase on the day the child survivors of a Cessna 206 plane that crashed in thick jungle were brought in by plane from San Jose del Guaviare, in Bogota, Colombia, on June 10, 2023. (Luisa Gonzalez/Reuters)

title: Japan, Australia, US to Fund Undersea Cable Connection in Micronesia to Counter China’s Influence

title: Underpaid Casuals at Australia’s Taronga Zoo Get $2.6M in Back Pay
description: A supplied undated image obtained Feb. 11, 2022 shows ‘Weja’, the young Echidna. ‘Weja’ was rescued and brought to Taronga Wildlife Hospital in October 2021. (AAP Image/Supplied by Taronga Conservation Society Australia)

title: 4 Colombian Children Found Alive in Jungle Weeks After Plane Crash
description: Colombian military soldiers attend to child survivors from a Cessna 206 plane that crashed on May 1 in the jungles of Caqueta, in limits between Caqueta and Guaviare, Colombia, on June 9, 2023. (Colombian Military Forces/Handout via Reuters)
